title: What is the differential of the given function? If y=8x^2-9x-23, then what is the difference of y? - Quora

response.answer_text: Thanks for the A2A!! Well from your question, I think you are trying to ask the differentiation of the function w.r.t y and w.r.t x. We have y=8x2−9x−23.y=8x2−9x−23. Differentiating w.r.t x, dydx=16x−9dydx=16x−9 Differentiating w.r.t y, 1=16xdxdy−9dxdy1=16xdxdy−9dxdy Taking dxdydxdy common, 1=dxdy(16x−9)1=dxdy(16x−9) ⟹dxdy=116x−9⟹dxdy=116x−9 Hope it helps you! Thank you!!
